main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 4 September 1953 in Dorchester, Massachusetts. The object was observed for 1-2 minutes, rapidly descending, hovering, traveling southeast, dropping and flowing below the clouds, then disappearing to the southwest.
interesting points: The UFO was described as round, white, and light blue in color.
It did not conform to the criteria for an international airport in Boston, Massachusetts, departing aircraft.
The sighting lasted for a short duration, indicating a brief but significant event.
The UFO's movement pattern included descending, hovering, and traveling before disappearing, suggesting advanced capabilities.
There were no photographs of the reported UFO.
sighted object: round, white, and light blue UFO
